data.text: @SamBuca45 @Zubhaque @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @chrischirp Oh dear, I hope they soon recover

@Loucarm85 @Zubhaque @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive A friend who's a teacher had ++ #COVID19 test on 4thfeb- isolated for 10 days &2neg LFTs

*Then* tested positive again on 23feb.

They feel unwell-fatigue,headache breathlessness

But also under pressure to return to the classroom for face to face teaching #LongCovid @chrischirp
@Loucarm85 @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @Zubhaque I'm so sorry fingers crossed for you all

@Loucarm85 @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive So sorry that you've been put in this impossible/scary position as a clinically vulnerable parent Luisa; hope your daughter is OK and wishing her a speedy recovery.x.
@Loucarm85 @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @Zubhaque I hope she gets better soon 🙏💙 🌈🦄
@Loucarm85 @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @Zubhaque 😢 sorry. I hope she’s better soon.
@Loucarm85 @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @Zubhaque Oh bless her hope she doesn’t feel too unwell for too long and that you & family keep well take care keep us posted xx
@Loucarm85 @dave_democracy @Parents_Utd @hivetosurvive @Zubhaque It’s not fair is it. Really hope she recovers quickly
